issue.title: www.wcoforever.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.wcoforever.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wcoforever.net%2F) ### Comment > Whenever I tried to watch a video this Adblock detector will pop up. It prevents me from seeing any part of the video unless the AdGuard is disable. I also noticed throughout the whole website random blank spaces are seen in specific spots. I believe these spaces are where ads are placed. When I disable the AdGuard the ads will show up, but once it’s enable only black spaces remain in their spots. Before I have this issue, no blank spaces were shown. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/7ryIaTg.png)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://login.taobao.com/member/login.jhtml](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flogin.taobao.com%2Fmember%2Flogin.jhtml) ### Comment Username: @liyuhaolol > 使用了您的产品以后，adguard会屏蔽掉taobao.com的用户登录，用户无法正常登录，登录的用户鼠标悬停也不会显示下拉菜单。会全部被adguard给屏蔽掉，请尽快修复这个问题！ > After using your product, adguard will block taobao.com. > Users can not login normally, and the logged in user will not display a drop-down menu when hovering over the mouse. It will be completely blocked by adguard. Please fix this problem as soon as possible! ### Screenshots
